ACK

FYI src/rpcprotocol.cpp has a mention of json-spirit in a comment (a URL) also
ACK.\nAgree with jgarzik on the removal of `rpcprotocol.cpp L254` in this PR.\n

@Diapolo: right. UniValue has some json_spirit compatibility functions which should be removed/changed (but not in this PR). Also some functions should be renamed `IsNull()` vs `get_str()` looks after a json_spirit compatibility relict.\n
